• Please allow additional travel time.

a.b: [N] [Q] [R] Trains skip 49 St in both directions

div:
New Year's Eve, 12 noon Sat to 12:15 AM Sun, Dec 31 - Jan 1
Use 34 St-Herald Sq or 57 St-7 Av for access to Times Square.
[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

a.b:
[N] No trains between Queensboro Plaza and Times Sq-42 St
[N] Trains skip 28, 23, 8 and Prince Sts in both directions
[4] [6] [7] [Q] and [R] trains provide alternate service

div:
Weekend, 5:45 AM to 6 PM, Saturday, Dec 31
[N] service operates in two sections:
1. Between Ditmars Blvd and Queensboro Plaza
2. Between Times Sq-42 St and Stillwell Av
Travel Alternatives[TP]
For service between Queens and Manhattan, take the [7] via transfer at
Queensboro Plaza and/or Times Sq-42 St.
For Lexington Av/59 St and 5 Av/59 St, take the [R] instead. Or, use the
nearby 59 St [4] [5] [6] Station via the [7] at Grand Central-42 St.
For 57 St-7 Av, 49, 28, 23, 8 and Prince Sts, take the [Q]* or [R] instead.
Transfer between [N] [Q] and [R] trains at Times Sq-42 St, 14 St-Union Sq or Canal St.
*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.
Note: [N] trains board at the Manhattan-bound platform at Queensboro Plaza.
